title: Part E
stimulusHtml: Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.
descriptions:
The response does not provide both the correct answer and a valid justification equivalent to the following.

· Disagree. According to Le Châtelier’s principle, the distribution of species will shift towards products when the temperature is decreased in an exothermic reaction. Therefore, the mole fraction of HBr MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbtv2zVvgiqjxAUrharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiFC0pg9uqGrpepeea0dXdHaVhbbe9u8qqaqFr0xc9pk 0xj9qqaqFj0dh9qq=xfr=JarFfpeea0=as0=fs0di9uqFr0=vr0=vr 0db8meaabaqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeGaeaaakeaacaqGibGaaeOqai aabkhaaaa@3B82@ will increase, not decrease.
